name: Zmrztani
description:
In this game, you need to delay melting in a tower-defense form and serve the ice cream in the least soup form as possible. 

You can place freezer points on green tiles. The coolness of ice cream as you serve grants you some amount of money accordingly. Later you can use this money to place more freezer. However, freezer start breaking due to the hot weather after 60 seconds. As temperature gets higher, ice cream melts faster. Come up with a strategy and try to reach 500 score to win!

Solo developed in Unity3D for Ludum Dare 50 in about 6 hours.
